name: import cad
desc: Read all versions of AutoCAD DWG and DXF files as well as Microstation DGN files.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Use Application Origin
properties.desc: When true, the module will apply the Application Origin. When false, data will be left in internal model space. Turn off when loading data intended to use as a glyph or similar.

properties.name: Render Mode
properties.desc: The Render Mode options allow you to choose how the CAD data will be rendered.  Please read the module help for more details.

properties.name: Unit Handling
properties.desc: The Unit Handling option determines whether we try to use units from the CAd file, or force the use of the default coordinate units.

properties.name: Default Coordinate Units
properties.desc: The units to use when the units cannot be determined from the CAD file

properties.name: Remove Coincident Nodes
properties.desc: The Remove Coincident Nodes toggle causes the reader to process the data, removing coincident nodes.  This takes longer to process but creates a smaller more efficient representation of your CAD data.

properties.name: Include Hidden Layers
properties.desc: The Include Hidden Layers toggle will cause CAD layers marked as hidden to be drawn.

properties.name: Remove Points And Degenerate Cells
properties.desc: The Remove Point and Degenerate Cells option will remove all points and degenerate cells from the output

properties.name: Show As Wireframe
properties.desc: The Show As Wire-frame toggle outlines surfaces.  It is equivalent to setting Line Rendering to 'regular'.

properties.name: Ignore Colors
properties.desc: The Ignore Colors option will ignore the colors in the CAD file

properties.name: Color For White
properties.desc: The Color For White button allows the user to set the color for any feature colored white.

properties.name: Deviation For Curves
properties.desc: The Deviation for Curves field allows the user to specify the accuracy with which analytical curves (arcs, circles) are displayed.  The default value of 0.0 employs an expert system algorithm to determine a reasonable value based on the overall size of your CAD model.

properties.name: Normal For 3D Solids
properties.desc: The Normal for 3D Solids specifies the tolerance for parallel faces.

properties.name: Separate Layers
properties.desc: The Separate Layers toggle causes each layer in the CAD file to be output as a separate cell set in EVS.

properties.name: Layers To Include
properties.desc: The Data To Include allows the user to set which sets of data to render.

properties.name: Convert To Packaged
properties.desc: Replace this module with a packaged version of the data.
